resources.string: Где у Вас установлен Blitz: во внутренней памяти или на внешней SD карте?
World of Tanks Blitz установлен, но не скачан кэш.\nПожалуйста запустите игру и скачайте все данные.
World of Tanks Blitz не установлен.\nПожалуйста скачайте игру в Google Play.
Вы должны дать права BlitzModder на запись в памяти, для того, чтобы он правильно работал.
Please select SD card to allow BlitzModder to access it.\n(Please don\'t select other than SD card root directory! Or BlitzModder won\'t work properly.)
Writing on SD card is restricted on Android OS 4.4 KitKat. If you have difficulty using SD card, please reinstall World of Tanks Blitz to internal storage.
Writing to SD card takes a very long time due to OS restriction.\n We recommend that you reinstall Blitz on internal storage.\nYou can change this settings afterwards.
Some error occurred. Please contact developer.
You can open World of Tanks Blitz with this button.
Are you sure to delete the whole data of World of Tanks Blitz? This process cannot be undone.
You can delete data of World of Tanks Blitz. After that, you need to open Blitz to initialize it.
Deleting Blitz Data is finished. Please open World of Tanks Blitz to initialize it.
Any feedback or question is welcome.
Are you sure to change storage setting?
Are you sure to delete this repository?
If you like my app, please donate to me.
This repository is invalid! Please contact the owner of this repository.
You can manage repositories to download mods list.
Tap here when something is wrong with BlitzModder
Are you sure to reset all settings of BlitzModder? This operation cannot be undone.
Tap here after you reinstall Blitz
Are you sure to reset installation data? This operation cannot be undone.
Storage setting has been cleared. You need to specify where Blitz is installed.
Tap here to refer to the usage of BlitzModder
